public class LinkRewriterImpl
extends org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
implements LinkRewriter, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.Serviceable, org.apache.avalon.framework.context.Contextualizable

Rewrite the links in a publication. This is used after renaming / moving a document.

Version:
$Id: LinkRewriterImpl.java 389040 2006-03-27 07:38:08Z josias $
